text: cheonsadeul-i geudeul-ege oji anhgileul balaneunyo animyeon junimgwa junim-ui yejung-i ileugileul gidaligo issneunyo junim-ui malsseum-i dolaehaneun nal ijeon-e mid-eum-eul gaj-ji anihago seon-eul silcheonhaji anihan jaga geuttae e geugeosdeul-eul mid-eulyeo haneun geuege neun geugeos-i yuyonghaji moshani illeo galodoe gidalila ulido yeogsi gi daligo issnola
